languages.text: "Просто пожелать удачи и сообщить, что когда вы, нагруженн{mf|ый|ая} трофеями, будете возвращаться, ни один корабль Пустотного братства не покусится на ваш трюм. Мы {d|Encyclopedia:PiratesRep_Mid}уважаем{/d} Вашу Светлость".

"Just to wish you good luck and let you know that when you're on your way back with your hold full of trophies, not one ship of the Fellowship of the Void is going to try and have a go at you. We {d|Encyclopedia:PiratesRep_Mid}respect{/d} Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship."
languages.original_text: "Просто пожелать удачи и сообщить, что когда вы, нагруженн{mf|ый|ая} трофеями, будете возвращаться, ни один корабль Пустотного братства не покусится на ваш трюм. Мы {d|Encyclopedia:PiratesRep_Mid}уважаем{/d} Вашу Светлость".

traits.locale_text: "Just to wish you good luck and let you know that when you're on your way back with your hold full of trophies, not one ship of the Fellowship of the Void is going to try and have a go at you. We respect Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship."
traits.speaker: FootfallPirateVendor_Rizza_Ch_4

traits.locale_text: "Just to wish you good luck and let you know that when you're on your way back with your hold full of trophies, not one ship of the Fellowship of the Void is going to try and have a go at you. We {d|Encyclopedia:PiratesRep_Mid}respect{/d} Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship."
traits.speaker: FootfallPirateVendor_Rizza_Ch_4

languages.text: “我只是想祝你好运。我想告诉你，等你带着满满一船战利品回来的时候，虚空协联的船绝对不会对你动手。我们{d|Encyclopedia:PiratesRep_Mid}尊重{/d}你的身份，大人。”
languages.original_text: "Just to wish you good luck and let you know that when you're on your way back with your hold full of trophies, not one ship of the Fellowship of the Void is going to try and have a go at you. We {d|Encyclopedia:PiratesRep_Mid}respect{/d} Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship."

traits.locale_text: “我只是想祝你好运。我想告诉你，等你带着满满一船战利品回来的时候，虚空协联的船绝对不会对你动手。我们尊重你的身份，大人。”
traits.speaker: FootfallPirateVendor_Rizza_Ch_4

languages.text: 「陛下の幸運を願おうと思ってね。それから、沢山のトロフィーと共にこの地に戻られた際は、虚空の仲間の船は誰も、あなたを狙おうとはしませんよ。あなたを{d|Encyclopedia:PiratesRep_Mid}尊敬{/d}していますからね、陛下」
languages.original_text: "Just to wish you good luck and let you know that when you're on your way back with your hold full of trophies, not one ship of the Fellowship of the Void is going to try and have a go at you. We {d|Encyclopedia:PiratesRep_Mid}respect{/d} Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship."

traits.locale_text: 「陛下の幸運を願おうと思ってね。それから、沢山のトロフィーと共にこの地に戻られた際は、虚空の仲間の船は誰も、あなたを狙おうとはしませんよ。あなたを{d|Encyclopedia:PiratesRep_Mid}尊敬{/d}していますからね、陛下」
traits.speaker: FootfallPirateVendor_Rizza_Ch_4

languages.text: «Para desearle buena suerte y hacerle saber que cuando esté de vuelta con la bodega llena de trofeos, ni una sola nave de la Hermandad del Vacío se meterá con usted. {mf|Le|La} {d|Encyclopedia:PiratesRep_Mid}respetamos{/d}, mi{mf|lord|lady}».
languages.original_text: "Just to wish you good luck and let you know that when you're on your way back with your hold full of trophies, not one ship of the Fellowship of the Void is going to try and have a go at you. We {d|Encyclopedia:PiratesRep_Mid}respect{/d} Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship."

traits.locale_text: «Para desearle buena suerte y hacerle saber que cuando esté de vuelta con la bodega llena de trofeos, ni una sola nave de la Hermandad del Vacío se meterá con usted. {mf|Le|La} respetamos, mi{mf|lord|lady}».
traits.speaker: FootfallPirateVendor_Rizza_Ch_4

languages.text: "Nur, um Euch viel Glück zu wünschen und Euch sagen: Wenn Ihr mit einem Lagerraum voller Trophäen auf dem Rückweg seid, wird kein einziges Schiff der Gefährten der Leere versuchen, Euch zu überfallen. Wir {d|Encyclopedia:PiratesRep_Mid}respektieren{/d} Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft."
languages.original_text: "Just to wish you good luck and let you know that when you're on your way back with your hold full of trophies, not one ship of the Fellowship of the Void is going to try and have a go at you. We {d|Encyclopedia:PiratesRep_Mid}respect{/d} Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship."

traits.locale_text: "Nur, um Euch viel Glück zu wünschen und Euch sagen: Wenn Ihr mit einem Lagerraum voller Trophäen auf dem Rückweg seid, wird kein einziges Schiff der Gefährten der Leere versuchen, Euch zu überfallen. Wir respektieren Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft."
traits.speaker: FootfallPirateVendor_Rizza_Ch_4

languages.text: « Simplement pour vous souhaiter bonne chance, et pour vous dire que quand vous reviendrez avec vos cales débordant de trophées, vous n'aurez rien à craindre des vaisseaux de la Communauté du vide. Nous avons le plus grand {d|Encyclopedia:PiratesRep_Mid}respect{/d} pour vous, Votre Seigneurie. »
languages.original_text: "Just to wish you good luck and let you know that when you're on your way back with your hold full of trophies, not one ship of the Fellowship of the Void is going to try and have a go at you. We {d|Encyclopedia:PiratesRep_Mid}respect{/d} Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship."

traits.locale_text: « Simplement pour vous souhaiter bonne chance, et pour vous dire que quand vous reviendrez avec vos cales débordant de trophées, vous n'aurez rien à craindre des vaisseaux de la Communauté du vide. Nous avons le plus grand respect pour vous, Votre Seigneurie. »
traits.speaker: FootfallPirateVendor_Rizza_Ch_4

languages.text: "Sana iyi şans dilemeye ve kucağında ganimetlerle döndüğünde Uçsuz Kardeşliği'nin tek bir gemisinin bile sana bulaşmayacağını söylemeye. {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'ne {d|Encyclopedia:PiratesRep_Mid}saygımız büyük{/d}."
languages.original_text: "Just to wish you good luck and let you know that when you're on your way back with your hold full of trophies, not one ship of the Fellowship of the Void is going to try and have a go at you. We {d|Encyclopedia:PiratesRep_Mid}respect{/d} Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship."

traits.locale_text: "Sana iyi şans dilemek ve kucağında ganimetlerle döndüğünde Uçsuz Kardeşliği'nin tek bir gemisinin bile sana bulaşmayacağını söylemek için. {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'ne {d|Encyclopedia:PiratesRep_Mid}saygımız büyük{/d}."
traits.speaker: FootfallPirateVendor_Rizza_Ch_4
